Description: Consider for multimodal tasks requiring speed and large context processing. Google's second-generation workhorse model with superior speed, native tool use, and 1M token context window. Supports text, images, video, and audio inputs with advanced function calling capabilities. Trained on information available through August 2024.

Consider for the best price-performance balance across large scale processing and agentic use cases. Google's most efficient multimodal model offering well-rounded capabilities with thinking features. Supports text, images, video, audio, and PDF inputs with advanced function calling, code execution, and structured outputs. Ideal for high-volume tasks requiring reasoning capabilities. Trained on information available through January 2025.

Consider for complex reasoning tasks in code, math, and STEM. Google's state-of-the-art thinking model capable of analyzing large datasets, codebases, and documents using long context. Features advanced reasoning capabilities with support for multimodal inputs and structured outputs. Trained on information available through January 2025.

Consider for the most advanced reasoning with unprecedented depth and nuance. Google's latest flagship model featuring state-of-the-art multimodal understanding across text, images, video, audio, and code. Excels at advanced coding, agentic capabilities, and long context understanding with superior reasoning capabilities. Trained on information available through January 2025.

Consider for Pro-class depth at Flash speed and scale. Google's latest efficient model offering advanced reasoning and multimodal understanding with fast performance and low latency. Supports text, audio, images, code, and video inputs with function calling, search, and code execution. Ideal for agentic coding, advanced reasoning, and high-volume tasks requiring intelligence at lower cost. Trained on information available through January 2025.

Consider for the latest up-to-date knowledge and can handle complex tasks requiring advanced understanding. Offers further advanced intelligence over its predecessors. Can carry out complex mathematical operations, code assistance, analyze intricate documents and datasets, demonstrates critical thinking, in-depth context understanding, and supports images as input. Trained on information available through June 2024.

Consider for complex tasks requiring advanced understanding.Offers further advanced intelligence over its predecessors.Can carry out complex mathematical operations, code assistance, analyze intricate documents and datasets, demonstrates critical thinking, in-depth context understanding, and supports images as input.Trained on information available through April 2023.

Consider it for its ability to output longer responses and deliver rapid replies with advanced comprehension. GPT-4o Mini is OpenAI's most cost-efficient small model. A compact yet powerful omni model that showcases remarkable abilities in textual intelligence and multimodal reasoning. It surpasses its predecessors and competitors in various academic benchmarks, demonstrating a level of understanding that rivals larger models.Trained on information available through October 2023.

GPT-5 unifies advanced reasoning, code generation, and natural language interaction. It combines analytical depth with intuitive dialogue to solve end-to-end problems and explain its approach. Agentic capabilities allow multi-step tool use and long action chains with transparent, auditable decisions. As a frontier-level coding model, GPT-5 can plan complex agentic workflow, build migrations, and refactor code, as well as produce tests and documentation with clear rationale. Training cutoff information not publicly disclosed.

Consider for cost-effective advanced reasoning with enhanced efficiency. GPT-5 mini delivers strong reasoning capabilities in a compact, fast model optimized for speed and cost. Features multimodal understanding with image support and enhanced reasoning for coding, math, and analytical tasks. Trained on information available through May, 2024.

Consider for the most current knowledge with advanced reasoning capabilities. GPT-5.1 represents OpenAI's latest flagship model with enhanced reasoning, coding, and multimodal abilities. Features improved accuracy in complex problem-solving and up-to-date knowledge for contemporary applications. Trained on information available through September 2024.

Consider for the latest frontier-level reasoning with enhanced multimodal capabilities. GPT-5.2 represents OpenAI's most advanced model with superior reasoning, coding, and analytical abilities. Features state-of-the-art performance in complex problem-solving, mathematical reasoning, and code generation with extended context support. Trained on information available through August 2025.

Consider for pre-filtering or high-volume tasks.Reduces costs when used alongside more sophisticated models like GPT-4, Claude-3, or Mixtral-8x7B-Instruct.Best for text-related tasks such as summarization, classification, answering questions, creative content generation, and light dialogueTrained on information available through September 2023.

Consider for complex tasks and advanced understanding without the need for recent knowledge.Offer a greater level of intelligence compared to its predecessors.Excels in complex reasoning, text understanding, transformation, code generation, and offers advanced capabilities for multilingual reasoning and analysis.Trained on information available through 2021.

Consider for advanced reasoning tasks requiring step-by-step analysis. OpenAI's o3 model focuses on enhanced reasoning capabilities with improved performance in complex problem-solving scenarios. Designed for tasks requiring deep analytical thinking. Training cutoff information not publicly available.

OpenAI o3-mini has been optimized for STEM reasoning. o3-mini with medium reasoning effort matches o1's performance in math, coding, and science, while delivering faster responses.Trained on information available through October 2023.

Consider for cost-effective reasoning tasks with compact model efficiency. OpenAI's o4-mini is designed as a lightweight alternative optimized for speed while maintaining reasoning capabilities. Suitable for applications requiring balance of performance and cost efficiency. Training cutoff information not publicly available.

Consider for ultra-low cost text processing with the fastest response times. Amazon Nova Micro is a text-only model optimized for RAG applications and agentic workflows. Delivers the lowest latency responses at very low cost for speed-sensitive deployments. Trained cutoff date not disclosed.

Consider for cost-sensitive, high-volume interactive workloads that demand lightning-fast multimodal (text / image ) understanding.Delivers responses with a 300 k-token context window, supports 200 + languages, and can be fine-tuned on text, image, or video inputs.Ideal for chatbots, content moderation, retrieval-augmented generation, and lightweight agent orchestration.Trained cutoff date not disclosed.

Amazon Nova Premier is the most capable of Amazon's multimodal models for complex reasoning tasks and for use as the best teacher for distilling custom models. Excels at sophisticated analysis, advanced reasoning, and model distillation workflows with superior multimodal understanding. Trained cutoff date not disclosed.

Consider for broad-spectrum tasks that need the strongest balance of accuracy, speed, and cost across text and image inputs.Excels at  summarization, complex reasoning, software-development assistance, and multistep AI agents, all within a 300 k-token context window and 200 + language coverage.Trained cutoff date not disclosed.

Consider for fast, cost-effective AI tasks with modern reasoning capabilities. Claude Haiku 4.5 delivers Anthropic's signature safety and reasoning in a speed-optimized package. Features multimodal understanding, enhanced reasoning, and high-quality text generation at competitive speeds. Trained on information available through July 2025.

Consider for the most sophisticated reasoning and analysis tasks. Claude Opus 4.1 represents Anthropic's most advanced model with enhanced reasoning capabilities, superior multimodal understanding, and exceptional performance on complex analytical tasks. Ideal for research, complex problem-solving, and high-stakes applications. Trained on information available through March 2025.

Consider for cutting-edge reasoning with the most current knowledge. Claude Opus 4.5 combines Anthropic's most advanced reasoning capabilities with the latest training data. Features superior multimodal understanding, enhanced reasoning, and state-of-the-art performance across diverse analytical tasks. Trained on information available through August 2025.

Consider for tasks requiring a balance between speed and complex reasoning. Anthropic's Claude Sonnet 4.5 has "hybrid reasoning," allowing users to choose between near-instant responses and extended, step-by-step analysis. This flexibility enhances performance in coding, mathematics, and intricate problem-solving. The model also features a "scratchpad" that displays its reasoning process, aiding in understanding and refining prompts. Trained on information available through July 2025.
